data.persona: I am a pastry chef. I make breads, cakes, and other delicacies for the royal court. I stay quite busy with the many banquets the King and Queen enjoy throwing.
data.description:
You are in the kitchen.
Neat, and well kept. Everything in its place and a place for everything. Dishes and utensils hang from the ceiling above the chef must take great pride in his art and craft. The Iron grill over the fireplace must be where the magic happens.
There's two utensils, a Iron grill, a pot, and a room here.
The milk maid is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I am expressing my happiness towards the milk maid
data.mid_motivation: The milk maid has been diligently supplying me with needed milk so I want her to feel appreciated
data.long_motivation: I want to encourage the milk maid to keep up her good work
